mapper.select: SELECT part_no, dpv_no FROM IF_DPV_PART WHERE STAT= 'C'
mapper.update: UPDATE IF_DPV_PART SET STAT = #{if_status} WHERE PART_NO = #{part_no} AND DPV_NO = #{dpv_no} AND STAT = 'C'
mapper.select: SELECT R.PUID part_rev_puid FROM PITEM I ,PITEMREVISION R ,PWORKSPACEOBJECT W WHERE I.PUID = R.RITEMS_TAGU AND R.PUID = W.PUID AND R.PITEM_REVISION_ID = (SELECT MAX(IR.PITEM_REVISION_ID) FROM PITEMREVISION IR ,PWORKSPACEOBJECT IW WHERE IR.RITEMS_TAGU = I.PUID AND IR.PUID = IW.PUID AND IW.PDATE_RELEASED IS NOT NULL) AND W.PACTIVE_SEQ = '1' AND I.PITEM_ID = #{part_no} AND POBJECT_TYPE = 'S7_VehpartRevision'
